attributes.action: Reappropriate MP raise to nurses, teachers and members of the armed forces
attributes.additional_details: Give the money to those who worked on the front line and have poor pay; Teachers: have had long pay freezes; work below minimum wage if the actual worked hours are calculated; have pay capped a salary scale so beyond 6 years of work, you cannot earn more.
attributes.background: Give the money to those who have low pay and who have had pay freezes.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out more about IPSA here: https://www.theipsa.org.uk/
